name: Alex Johnson
title: Senior Loan Officer
headline: Your Mortgage, Done Right.
subheadline: Alex Johnson is a licensed mortgage loan officer with 12 years of experience helping buyers and investors close fast.
bio: With over a decade in the mortgage industry, Alex specializes in purchase loans, DSCR investment loans, and VA loans. He's helped over 500 families achieve homeownership across Arizona, Texas, and beyond.

loanProducts.name: Home Purchase
loanProducts.description: Buying your first home or upgrading? We'll find the right loan.

loanProducts.name: Refinance
loanProducts.description: Lower your rate, shorten your term, or pull cash out.

loanProducts.name: DSCR Investment Loans
loanProducts.description: Grow your rental portfolio without W2 income requirements.

loanProducts.name: FHA & Low Down Payment
loanProducts.description: 3–3.5% down payment options for eligible buyers.

loanProducts.name: VA Home Loans
loanProducts.description: $0 down for eligible veterans and active-duty military.

testimonials.author: Sarah M.
testimonials.text: Made the homebuying process so smooth. Everything was explained clearly and we closed in 28 days.

testimonials.author: James & Linda T.
testimonials.text: We were first-time buyers and nervous about the process. Alex held our hand through every step.

testimonials.author: Mike R.
testimonials.text: Used them for my third DSCR loan. They know the investor side better than anyone.

differentiators: Local market expertise with 12 years of experience
Investor-friendly: DSCR, LLC lending, portfolio strategies
Direct access to your loan officer — not a call center
Fast closings: 21–30 days for most purchases
